text: A hectogon or hectagon is a shape with 100 sides and 100 corners. == Regular hectogon == All sides of a regular hectogon are the same length. Each corner is 176.4°. All corners added together equal 17640°. === Area === The area of a regular hectogon of side length a is given by :A = 25a^2 \cot \frac{\pi}{100} \simeq 795.513 a^2 == References == 100
title: Hectogon
